name: HoneyDew
tagline: Manage your Kanban boards and tasks via the OpenClaw agent.
description:
HoneyDew is a sleek, simple Kanban board powered for busy humans and their AI assistants. This skill lets your OpenClaw agent create, update, move, and delete cards; manage boards, columns, and labels; transfer tasks between user and agent profiles; and surface overdue or urgent items.

Designed for local and trusted-network use, the skill connects to the HoneyDew REST API with no authentication required. Just start the app and the agent handles the rest.

Ideal for developers and teams who want an AI agent to manage their task boards hands-free.
